CustomField.description: Used to hold a campaign partner member's related e-signature filed packet that is related to a person related to signer format. This works in conjunction with automation that pulls files into the button to create e-sig file to send off to clients.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Standard file for Other party acting on behalf of Signer. See variation for unique circumstances for Partner firms.
CustomField.label: Standard E-Sig Packet (Other)
